The easy to use tool made for developers, by developers.

With Craft, you can easily create new mods for multiple platforms with high-level programming.

WHY CRAFT?

Fast, free, and
easy to learn.

Built with Kotlin and open source, Craft is the most efficient way to create complex mods for Forge, modpacks and custom clients.

Craft also solves most of the issues that Java creates. No more janky updating, slow compiling, or lack of security.

GET STARTED WITH CRAFT

It's easy to get started.

app install craft
